metadata.title: CVE-2017-11468 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Docker Registry before 2.6.2 in Docker Distribution does not properly restrict the amount of content accepted from a user, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via the manifest endpoint.

criterions.comment: docker-registry package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.2~ds1-1').
